[i]Pride[/i] – Whenever a creature with greater power blocks Hayato, The Kid, exchange his power with target creature blocking him until end of turn.
[i]Wind Tribe Heir[/i] – Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if Hayato attacked this turn, you may pay {2}. If you do, exile it as it resolves with three time counters on it. It gains suspend if it did not have suspend.
